title: Hortelã de Burro (Cedronella triphylla)
body: Sub-shrub of the mint family with a strong and unpleasant smell; leaves with 3 lanceolate and crenate segments; large, violet, veined corollas, dilated on the face. It is frequent in Monte, Ribeiro Frio, Camacha, Jardim da Serra, etc..

Monte: Location where Cedronella triphylla is frequent
Ribeiro Frio: Location where Cedronella triphylla is frequent
Camacha: Location where Cedronella triphylla is frequent
Jardim da Serra: Location where Cedronella triphylla is frequent
